backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes the blob‑storage Mixin module.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Guide explaining how to configure DNS and use a custom domain with the IC app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment instructions for local and mainnet environments with config and troubleshooting steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing header, hero, upload section, gallery, and footer.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Gallery grid that loads images, handles loading/error states, and displays items.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryI: Image card with thumbnail, download button, and delete workflow with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ImageUpl: React component for selecting, previewing, validating, and uploading images with drag-and-drop and progress handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing logo/title and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/config/runtime.ts: Determines runtime canister ID and host settings based on environment for backend communication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login, logout, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for listing, uploading, and deleting images via the backend actor with react-query integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light/dark modes and gallery grid layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, high‑level description, and a list of implemented features for an IC-backed image gallery app. Contains metadata about authentication, actor management, runtime config, image CRUD hooks, and UI helpers.
